name: CXPlayDTMFCallAction
desc: An encapsulation of the act of playing a dual tone multifrequency (DTMF) sequence.

items.name: init(call: UUID, digits: String, type: CXPlayDTMFCallAction.ActionType)
items.desc: Initializes a new action for a call identified by a given UUID, as well as a specified type and sequence of digits.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action to play dual-tone multifrequency (DTMF) tones with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var digits: String
items.desc: The digits tapped by the user into the in-call keypad or included in the dial string.

items.name: var type: CXPlayDTMFCallAction.ActionType
items.desc: The type of the call action.

items.name: enum CXPlayDTMFCallAction.ActionType
items.desc: The types of events that generate dial tones.
